# midi


<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

`.mid` files can be loaded locally or from a URL and played in a Jupyter
notebook with `MIDIPlayer`.

This tests loads a basic sequence of notes from a URL.
